message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would you consider selling the product for $13,000? I believe this would be a fair compromise for both of us.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While $13,000 is a fair offer, I'm hoping to get a bit closer to my initial asking price.  Would you consider $13,500?  This would still be a great deal for you and would allow me to make a good profit.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering your latest offer, I would like to propose $13,000 as a counteroffer. I hope this aligns better with your expectations while still staying within my budget.
